description: This is a spiritual warfare. They’re demons behind every sin you commit. Their only job is to manipulate you into sinning and to distract you from the righteous path the Heavenly Father has set out for you. They also work through people to try and throw you off also. Some people are literally put in your life by satan to distract you and throw you off track. Stay sober and stay vigilant so your spiritual armor is polished and ready for battle! That’s why I’m so against drug abuse and marijuana! Because that gives these demonic spirits access into your life! I don’t care what anyone says that’s the truth and you can’t change it! #hollyweirdisevil
